oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Martin Luther King, Jr. to George W. Lee
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; Lee, George W.; King, Martin Luther, Jr.;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Dr. King to Lee discussing their recent inability to meet and expressing hope that they can meet in the future.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: King, Martin Luther, Jr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Mary B. Clark
